name: SnowNose beta 1
description:
Find the carrots and put them on the snowmen to complete the game, a christmas by any other carrot wouldnt smell so sweet.

I made all the 3d models for this  and I used unity to package please enjoy

aswd to move mouse to look 

space to jump 

shift to sprint

Happy christmas from 2PurpleSwitchs

ps this is going to be a horror game and will change in alpha so please check out the alpha in a day or so
